attributes.action: Prohibit the term sex in the Equality Act 2010 representing only biological sex
attributes.additional_details:
49% of UK society that pays little/no attention to Trans news say that discrimination is a significant issue for the community (YouGov Poll).

To propose that stripping rights for Trans and Non-binary people is to protect Women and Children is to decimate both. Many understand the burden and self-repression to keep one safe.

The cost of living crisis is a much more precarious knife edge that needs the Government's actual attention.
attributes.background:
To recede on their aim to class 'sex' in the Equality Act 2010 as the biologically binary 'Female' and 'Male' of our society.

This is a regression for our society rather than a clarification and inclusivity that would be more progressive - bracketed genders (Trans, Binary, Non-Binary) instead.
